entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early in the afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy in the afternoon and ending late in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late in the morning then northwest 50 gusting to 70. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:40 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
